Department of Energy.Description: The Department of Energy regulates the nuclear industry through its oversight of the Nuclear Regulatory Commission.
The Department of Energy collaborates with the National Renewable Energy Laboratory to advance research and development in renewable energy technologies.
The Department of Energy partners with ExxonMobil on various initiatives related to energy efficiency and clean energy technologies.
The Department of Energy works closely with the International Atomic Energy Agency to promote the peaceful use of nuclear energy and ensure nuclear safety.
The Department of Energy collaborates with Energy Star to promote energy efficiency.
